title: Make Your Bed - Quilted Bed Runners, Pillows and More to Suit Yo
description:
Make Your Bed: Quilted Bed Runners, Pillows and More to Suit Your Style (That Patchwork Place)
by Leslee Evans
That Patchwork Place |  August 2011 | PDF | ISBN: 1604680474 | 98 pages | 48.4 Mb <a href="
http://www.amazon.com/Make-Your-Bed-Quilted-Patchwork/dp/1604680474" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.amazon.com/Make-Your-Bed-Quilted-Patchwork/dp/1604680474</a>

Discover nine gorgeous sets of bed runners with coordinating projects such as pillows, shams, and embellished sheets. Specially designed to drape across the foot of the bed, each stunning bed runner offers a quick and beautiful way to decorate.

* Includes many two-sided designs for added versatility--change the look of a bedroom with the simple flip of a quilt
* Offers a variety of sets to suit your mood: sassy, serene, playful, elegant, charming, and more
* Inspires quilters to experiment with new ideas and techniques on smaller projects

Leslee Evans' new book includes patterns for 9 bedroom ensembles, each featuring a quick-to-make bed runner and coordinating accessories. Whether your style is classic, playful, earthy, or elegant, there are quilted projects here to freshen any bedroom in your home. Picking up some brand new Sumatra batiks by Blank Quilting would be a great way to start on several of Leslee's patterns. The depth of color and intriguing patterns in these fabrics will make your bedroom a unique, interesting retreat.

About the Author
Home: Atlanta, Georgia Leslee Evans learned to sew at age eight. She has a master's degree in architecture and is the owner of Horsefeathers Quilting. An award-winning quilter, Leslee has made more than a hundred quilts and quilted many more for her clients.
